Text:
thanks for these...

any chance you've got Batgirl #1 to upload as well?

Yeah Im excited for BG1 - I just read Batgirl Year One and Im interested to see how it stacks up.

Keep it up GH - we'll just leave the 52 to you :)
Ain't scanned yet, don't worry I'll try to scan it asap.

@Mr.Downtown, C'mon man, y'know I can't handle the whole thing, you're gonna have to help me :))

On another note, out of the ones uploaded so far, I found this to be a pleasant surprise.

yeah, i strangely enjoyed this one as well

Stormwatch was a complete letdown, but i can't wait to see how Batgirl stacks up :)

GH: If you leave us any LOL

Ive only read the preview of this issue, first few pages, but the constant bickering gets old. Also I found it sad that they had to put Batman on the cover to try to sell a JL with a bunch of nobodys. Lets see how it turns out though

ps youse guys
swamp thing was the SHIT!
I got excited when I thought they were gonna put Blue Beetle on the team. Do you have static shock?
No need to request any particular 52 comic - they are ALL being uploaded as they become available, just keep checking back
hmm the search function of this site is fucked, I type in The New 52 and get some of the comics that are on here, and this one sure as hell wasn't on the list when I searched it.
